attributes.action: To make MPs behave in a civilised manner when in parliament.
attributes.additional_details:
This is not aimed at any particular party - all parties have done this for time immemorial, but it doesn't mean it's correct behaviour.
Sign this and let's try to make MPs act decently (they don't seem to want to do it without a nudge)
attributes.background: MPs represent us, our country. They are highly educated and are responsible for the running of the country - why are they allowed to act like imbeciles in their work place ? The speaker should be forced to eject anyone that can't act with respect to his fellow MPs

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Parliament and Government. Were you to start a petition calling for specific action on how this can be enforced, then we could consider it.

You might be interested in signing the following petitions on penalising MPs and for MPs to behave in a professional manner: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/121149
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/111691
